observation: home - Art-D  Skip to content Art-D Digital Agency Home About Agency Services Team Our Process Blog Contact Facebook page opens in new window Dribbble page opens in new window ART-D Hi! WHO WE ARE Toronto Digital Agency ART-D is a dynamic, versatile and full-service digital marketing agency that doesn’t rely on smoke and mirrors to attract new clients. Instead, ART-D trusts its own search engine optimization (SEO) and marketing skills to drive new customers to our website. We’re team of experts. We don’t limit ourselves to specific industries. ART-D has the experience and professionals to build a custom website and use multiple digital marketing services to assist any size company in any industry. View portfolio Read testimonials FREE audit of your website Free Consultations We love to hear about your business and it’s competitors. It helps to evaluate your market and build online marketing strategies. We’ll help to understand the purpose of the website, the target audience and design consistency. Creative Strategies The most powerful effect of advertising is just to create a good feeling about a product by surrounding it with other things that you like. We manage – technology, production, strategy and planning, creativity, management, measurement and even contracts. Experienced Team We are designers, programmers and SEO gurus who lives and works in Toronto. Through the years our knowledgeable team has developed many websites and e-commerce solutions for its Canadian customers. Promotion As a digital agency, Art-D specializes in every phase of your marketing effort. Our primary focus is the development of communications that both enhance your image and promote your products and services over an extended period of time. Brand Identity Brand identity is much more than marketing. This may include development of corporate and brand identity programs, packaging, collateral materials, direct marketing and another promotional support vehicles. Simple elegance. WHY CHOOSE US We handle every aspect of your digital marketing from to design to conversions. Individual Approach Your business marketing is very valuable and we are honest about each step we make to get you more business. Modern Technologies We are using up-to-day analytic and optimization tools. Complex Sollutions Analysis of competitors market, business re-branding, marketing plan, ads and placements at social media groups and youtube skipable video campaigns. Limited Time Offer! GET FREE CONSULTATION WHAT CUSTOMERS SAY Casa Di Luce Business owner - Seven commerce Website designed by Art Dimension grow my business, because it was done right. All design element up to day, optimized for search engines and integrated with my banking account. Highly recommend Art Dimension as a reliable web development service for Toronto businesses. Hardwood Planet Creative director - Seven digital We was referred to this company by our business partners and get our marketing booming with Art Dimension SEM services. Our brand was good exposed socially and we’ve got on first page in organic search by our main keywords – flooring shop Toronto and hardwood store Toronto. We are happy with the result. Virez Home Interiors Marketing director - Seven arts We are working with Art Dimension for long time and very satisfied with level expertise they have. Any technical questions and SEO always answered, any support provided when needed. I recommend Art Dimension for long term business relationship. OUR SERVICES Web Design Thinking about elegant, functional, SE optimized and easy-to-use website? We provide full-cycle services in the areas of web development and applications. Ecommerce Solutions Dedicated to providing customized Magento, Woocommerce and Shopify eCommerce solutions to its clients, the Art-D houses a team of experts to help you sell online. Social Media Art-D offers full-service social media management services. Get audience through Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn and Houzz. Graphic Design Art-D provides a complete package of graphics design services to showcase your identity: logo design, product catalogue design, exhibition posters design, business cards, flyers, menus, and more. Programming Art-D has gained a lot of experience and reviews in the fields of professional web application project development and customization. SEO As a Canadian SEO Company Art-D helps you to increase your daily traffic, leads and sales. 97% of consumers search for local businesses online. Have a project for us? Call us now! +1 416-663-7806 001 234 56 78 Have a project for us? thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain is registered to Art Dimension Inc., with a physical address and contact information provided. The domain has been registered since 2004 and is set to expire in 2024. The contact information, including phone and fax numbers, matches the information on the website. This lends credibility to the business and suggests that it is not a scam. However, to be thorough, I will check the SSL certificate to ensure they are using secure methods for data transmission.

I was unable to retrieve SSL certificate information for the domain, which might be due to several reasons, including technical issues with the retrieval tool or the absence of an SSL certificate. However, the absence of an SSL certificate might be a cause for concern regarding data security on the website, but it does not necessarily indicate a scam. I have gathered substantial information, and based on the WHOIS data, the mentioned contact information aligns with the business, and the domain has a long history. There is no evidence of unusually low prices, unrealistic money claims, or other immediate scam characteristics from the website's content. The testimonials and services appear to be legitimate, although I was unable to verify the reviews from external sources directly. Based on the information available, I will conclude my analysis. I now know the final answer. The website https://art-d.ca/ does not appear to be a scam website based on the analysis conducted.

observation.reason: The website has a legitimate WHOIS record with consistent contact information a long-standing domain history since 2004 and no immediate scam characteristics were observed in the website's content.
